website_summaries.verdict: Sturdy construction; it can take some jostling in your bag. Budget-friendly price and quality tracking.
pros: Easy-to-use app with frequent updates for improved efficiency
With a replaceable battery and sturdy construction, expect to have this finder for years
Sound is easy to hear (but not piercing)
cons: Some reports of difficulty pairing to devices

customer_reviews.title: Morning rush saver!
customer_reviews.text: I always lose my keys or my phone this has changed the game. When I’m rushing in the morning and can’t find my keys I just go onto my phone and press the button and the ringing sound goes off so I can find them. Or If I lose my phone I can press the button on the key finder and it will sound my phone so I can follow the ringing and find it. I also love how pretty it looks on the key chain and it’s a very sleek design.
customer_reviews.author: MaryKate Caron

customer_reviews.title: Sadly it doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this item doesn't work. It connects for a couple of seconds and then just disappears. It looks really nice but it doesn't function.
customer_reviews.author: SavannasauR

customer_reviews.title: Key chain
customer_reviews.text: This is a great present for someone that loses things. Very lightweight and classy looking. Easy to set up and ready to use
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: very helpful device.  getting one for each of our cars
customer_reviews.text: features are really of great usefulness. tried it out with my keys and was very pleased with the features. great value for the money, and according to my wife, “it’s stylish too!”
customer_reviews.author: paul kaus

customer_reviews.title: Quiet beep but works well otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Lost keys for the first time today and couldn't hear the beep. When I did find them the beep was so quiet it was not heard unless put directly against your ear. Aside from feeling a little cheap all other parts work fine. Would love to know if there's a way to turn up the volume for the Nut because it would be nice to actually hear the beep instead of playing hot and cold on the app.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Bauch

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waster your money...
customer_reviews.text: Never worked correctly... all this thing would do it go crazy every time it was in my pocket and got bumped... never made a sound when I needed it to and always made sounds when I didn’t want it to...
customer_reviews.author: Robert W

customer_reviews.title: Broken in 1 week
customer_reviews.text: This product lasted 1 week before breaking. If you EVER drop your keys you should NOT get this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Device didn’t work not even with replacement battery
customer_reviews.text: The product never worked and the company was vague about what to do in the case the device/batteries didnt work
customer_reviews.author: Mary-Kate Moran

customer_reviews.title: It just looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Poor and cheap. No No NO. Better buy original tile.
customer_reviews.author: Taropon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great value
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this because when we.l bought my daughter’s car it only came with one set of keys and we didn’t want to spend $200 to get a spare. This device has been a lifesaver!
customer_reviews.author: Lorie Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This will fall apart on your keychain within a few months. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Hscarb

customer_reviews.title: Beeps wayy too much
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine for a while but it would unconnect/reconnect when it wasn't far enough away from my phone. It went off anew times in my classes so I just turned it off and havent used it since
customer_reviews.author: Jaci

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t pair
customer_reviews.text: Finally got around to using it but it won’t pair with my iPhone! And, the return window has closed. Oh well, lesson learned to not wait weeks after buying something.
customer_reviews.author: srast3

customer_reviews.title: Low Volume
customer_reviews.text: Alarm volume is definitely not 90db!! Probably only 60db at the most!.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Thiele

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Worth the purchase. I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Kelly O’Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Found it!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. It was so easy to set up. It’s useful for finding items that are in the same house and/or room (nearby). It was worth the $$$ especially since I am blind and I can follow the beep. If you are having trouble finding items near you this is the item for you. NOTE: this is NOT a GPS unit, it is for finding misplaced things around you.
customer_reviews.author: kathleengreen

customer_reviews.title: Where on earth did I put my...
customer_reviews.text: Thank god for this key finder. I don’t know what happened to me but once I became a mom, I swear my memory had decided. I have used this more times than I would like to admit. I love the color too. The Rose gold is super pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie J. Fitte

customer_reviews.title: Tracking my teenager
customer_reviews.text: This has been great to keep up with my teenage daughter who has misplaced her small wallet pouch. Now we can track her when she misplaced it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Big Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: This item is unusable. Tried my best to attach to Bluetooth, which I have been very successful with using other devices. Got stuck on the password part. No number to call for help. No email address to ask for help. Worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette G. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: EVERYONE, QUIET!!!
customer_reviews.text: Three stars because the tone it gives off is so high pitched that your dog would be more likely to find your keys than you are, especially if they are stuck in a couch cushion or something like that.
customer_reviews.author: Valentino

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Now I'm TOO conscious of when I leave my keys or cell phone. The item has TRAINED me. That said, I really need a start up instruction for DUMMIES, cuz I am one.
customer_reviews.author: AJMoore

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: A gift for mom in law. She always looses her keys, so this was definitely a big help for her and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: This thing has saved me so much time looking for my keys!
customer_reviews.author: Tsp

customer_reviews.title: Great idea. Needs tweaking.
customer_reviews.text: For me...the jury is still out on this. I've been using it for quite a few days. The problem is...that the noise it makes to let you know where it's at if it's misplaced is so low you can't hear it. I think that, theoretically, the idea is good. Very good in fact. It just needs tweaking.
customer_reviews.author: Callie

product_meta.title: Key Finder Locator Smart Anti-Lost Tracker, H+LUX Phone Finder Wallet Finder Bluetooth Key Finder with Anti-Lost Alarm Reminder, Replaceable Battery, App Control for iOS Android Devices, White

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars67 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
